mapper.select: select i.train_id, s.station_name start_station, t.station_name arrive_station, r.start_clock, r.arrive_clock, r.mile, lt.ticket_num, i.train_style, i.train_class, r.mile*ra.ticket_rate price from T_route r, T_station s, T_station t, T_train_info i, T_ticket_rate ra, LeftTicket lt where (r.station_id=s.station_id) AND r.arrive_station = t.station_id AND s.station_name=#{start_station} AND t.station_name=#{arrive_station} AND r.train_id = i.train_id AND r.start_date = #{ticket_date} AND i.train_class = ra.ticket_class AND lt.train_id = i.train_id AND lt.ticketDate = #{ticket_date}
